articles.title: WarnerMedia expands free HBO Max deal to HBO subscribers who pay through Apple’s services - The Verge
articles.description: WarnerMedia is expanding its free HBO Max offering to include current HBO and HBO Now customers who pay for their subscriptions through Apple, per a new deal that will also see the new streaming service better integrate into the Apple TV app.
articles.content:
HBO Max will also integrate into the Apple TV app when it launches
WarnerMedia and Apple have reached a deal that will give free HBO Max access to existing HBO customers who subscribe to the service through Apple. Free access begins when the new streaming se… [+1346 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp Viral Message Forwarding Drops 70% After New Limits To Stop Coronavirus Misinformation - Forbes
articles.description: Earlier this month, WhatsApp stopped users from forwarding a message more than once to stop rumours about coronavirus going viral.
articles.content:
WhatsApp has seen a 70% drop in the number of viral forwarded messages being sent, three weeks after the Facebook-own messaging app imposed a limit on shared messages to halt the spread of coronavirus misinformation.
